HttpRouteResource.description: Resource that specifies an HTTP Route. An HTTP Route resource provides a stable URL that can be used to route internal or extrnal traffic to a component.

hostname.description: The internal hostname accepting traffic for the route. Readonly.

port.description: The port number for the route. Defaults to 80.

scheme.description: The scheme used for traffic. Readonly.

url.description: A stable URL that that can be used to route traffic to a component. Readonly.

HttpRouteGateway.description: Specifies configuration to allow public traffic from outside the network to the route. Configure a gateway to accept traffic from the internet.

hostname.description: Specifies the public hostname for the route. Use '*' to listen on all hostnames.
